price: 遭遇死亡之前，你们确已希望死亡；现在你们确已亲眼见到死亡了。
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ كُنتُمۡ تَمَنَّوۡنَ ٱلۡمَوۡتَ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن تَلۡقَوۡهُ فَقَدۡ رَأَيۡتُمُوهُ وَأَنتُمۡ تَنظُرُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: walaqad kuntum tamannawna al-mawta min qabli an talqawhu faqad ra-aytumūhu wa-antum tanẓurūna
